text:
On the Graph Results listener component, the label "No of Samples" is not 
translated correctly to Japanese.  It is translated to the Japanese meaning "no 
samples".

file: jakarta-jmeter/src/core/org/apache/jmeter/resources/messages_ja.properties
key: graph_results_no_samples
value: \u30B5\u30F3\u30D7\u30EB\u306A\u3057
should be: \u30B5\u30F3\u30D7\u30EB\u6570
creator: shinobu@apache.org
shinobu@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 12645
The correct Japanese label for graph_results_no_samples

creator: shinobu@apache.org
text:
I have posted a patch to fix the translation:
http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/showattachment.cgi?attach_id=12645
